basic_information.scholarship_name: Bill and Mary Lewis Special Education Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Bill and Mary Lewis SPED Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate or graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Special Education major at UCO- graduate or undergraduate Must have completed 60 credit hours by the time funds are distributed Minimum 2.75 GPA Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Spec Ed-Mild/Mod Disabilities   or SIS_Major is Spec Ed-SP/Mult Disabilities   or SIS_Major is Special Education
